About us

TALOS ROBOTICS

Talos-robotics is a group of undergraduate students at Electrical and Computer Engineering department at University of Thessaly in Volos, Greece. Our interest lies in the field of Robotics and our primary aspiration is to create interesting and innovative applications in that field. Our motto is : "There are those who dream and wish and there are those who dream and work" .You can find our members here.

Our Projects

Name

"Name" is a robotic hand that it can jerk you made you a caffee , cook you and whatever else you want.It can also play football ,chess , and replace every waiter/tress in this fucking universe. It has an embedded AI that can allow it to replace humans and control our lives and our mind.
